properties.title: Luxurious Beach House
properties.description: Beautiful beachfront property with stunning ocean views
properties.fullDescription:
This stunning beachfront property offers the ultimate luxury living experience. Enjoy breathtaking ocean views from almost every room in this meticulously designed modern home.

The spacious open floor plan features floor-to-ceiling windows, allowing natural light to flood the interior spaces. The gourmet kitchen is equipped with high-end appliances, custom cabinetry, and a large center island perfect for entertaining.

The master suite is a true retreat with a private balcony, walk-in closet, and a spa-like bathroom featuring a soaking tub and rainfall shower. Three additional bedrooms provide ample space for family and guests.

Outside, the property boasts a private beach access, expansive deck, infinity pool, and outdoor kitchen - perfect for enjoying the spectacular sunset views and coastal lifestyle.

properties.title: Modern Downtown Apartment
properties.description: Sleek, contemporary apartment in the heart of the city
properties.fullDescription:
Experience the pinnacle of urban luxury living in this meticulously designed contemporary apartment in the heart of Beverly Hills.

This sleek, modern residence features an open-concept floor plan with designer finishes throughout. The gourmet kitchen boasts Italian cabinetry, quartz countertops, and premium stainless steel appliances.

The spacious primary suite includes a walk-in closet and an en-suite bathroom with a rainfall shower and double vanity. The second bedroom is perfect for guests or a home office space.

Building amenities include 24-hour concierge service, a state-of-the-art fitness center, rooftop pool with panoramic city views, and a resident lounge perfect for entertaining.

Located within walking distance to high-end shopping, fine dining, and entertainment venues, this property offers the perfect blend of luxury and convenience.

properties.title: Hillside Villa
properties.address: 789 Mountain View Blvd, Hollywood Hills, CA 90068
properties.description: Spacious villa with panoramic city views
properties.fullDescription:
Perched in the prestigious Hollywood Hills, this magnificent villa offers unparalleled luxury and breathtaking panoramic views of the city below.

This architectural masterpiece features soaring ceilings, walls of glass, and an open floor plan designed for both comfortable living and sophisticated entertaining. The chef's kitchen is equipped with custom cabinetry, premium appliances, and an oversized island.

The primary suite is a true sanctuary with a private terrace, fireplace, dual walk-in closets, and a spa-inspired bathroom with a soaking tub and steam shower. Four additional bedrooms, each with its own ensuite bathroom, provide ample space for family and guests.

Outdoor amenities include an infinity-edge pool and spa, multiple terraces for dining and lounging, an outdoor kitchen, and a fire pit â€“ all designed to maximize the stunning views and California indoor-outdoor lifestyle.

Additional features include a home theater, wine cellar, gym, smart home automation, and a three-car garage.

properties.title: Cozy Beach Townhouse
properties.description: Charming townhouse just steps from the beach
properties.fullDescription:
Experience the quintessential Venice Beach lifestyle in this charming townhouse just steps from the sand and surf.

This beautifully maintained residence offers a bright, open floor plan with abundant natural light. The main level features a spacious living room with a fireplace, dining area, and updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops.

Upstairs, you'll find a primary bedroom with a walk-in closet and ensuite bathroom, plus two additional bedrooms and a full bathroom. A private rooftop deck provides the perfect space for outdoor dining, sunbathing, and enjoying magnificent sunset views.

Additional features include a two-car garage, in-unit laundry, and recent upgrades to the plumbing and electrical systems.

Located in the heart of Venice, this townhouse is just a short walk from the vibrant boardwalk, trendy shops, acclaimed restaurants, and the famous Muscle Beach. Experience the unique blend of beach living and urban convenience that only Venice can offer.
nearbyAmenities: Trendy cafes and restaurants (5 min walk)
